page.title: 12MENDIP WALK (PART 2)
page.content: Our family have lived there for two and three quarter years. There are 3 people living in our house. We have a gas fire and central heating. My next door neighbour's son often plays with my sister. He is called Colin. He is 3 years old and goes to afternoon nursery at Coundon School. My sister is 6 years old. She goes to Coundon Infant's school and she is in Mrs. Earl's class. She sometimes plays with Faye McManners from no.2. The houses are made of brick and have a layer of pebble dash on them. I like our house and I like most of the people who live in the street although I do not know some of them. There are a lot of thick bushes in our street and we might be getting a nest in ours because we saw birds carrying straw and grass in.
